title: Word of the Day
description: Your app fetched this from a remote endpoint!

movies.title: Convivial
movies.wordDefintition: (of an atmosphere or event) friendly, lively, and enjoyable.

movies.title: Condign
movies.wordDefintition: (of punishment or retribution) appropriate to the crime or wrongdoing; fitting and deserved.

movies.title: Commodious
movies.wordDefintition: (especially of furniture or a building) roomy and comfortable.
